# LLM Configuration for Math Calculator Pro
# Version: 1.2.0
# Updated: 2025-07-22

# Include all markdown files in the docs directory
docs/**/*.md

# Include configuration files
*.json
*.yaml
*.yml

# Include source code for context
src/**/*.ts
src/**/*.tsx
src/**/*.js

# Include documentation
README.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
CHANGELOG.md

# Exclude
node_modules/**
.next/**
out/**
*.log
*.lock
